name: Hampton Inn Winter Haven

reviews.text: Great hotel choice near the new legoland. (no jacuzzii) The Staff was unbelievable, the type of service you expect at a world class high end resort (and you don't at this level). It does not show up on my map app on my smart phone so it took a little work to find. There are lots of lakes in the area and the road network is confusing. Also I recommend the BBQ joint in the nearby Springfield mall. Be sure and ask for the Chipotle sauce (only given out on request)
reviews.title: Legoland

reviews.text: Good location, though difficult to see / find from the main road. Hotel lobby was very nice and clean. Breakfast was nicely done, though seating can be limited. Hotel room with two (2) double beds was OK - hair found on the floor and in the shower area of the bathroom and the room itself smelled of strong cleaning product.
reviews.title: Legoland Visit

reviews.text: i was hesitant on traveling with the kids without a male accompaning us. but i must say hampton inns was a great hotel. the staff was terrific and we had a great time. the room was clean and comfortable. i would absolutely recommend the hamton inn for a relaxing vacation or a business stay.
reviews.title: perfect hotel
Long awaited reunion
reviews.text: This hotels' employees were a vital part in us visiting Winter Haven Fla. for a long awaited (18yrs) reunion with my Aunt and Uncle. Who are by the way my only living relatives left on my maternal side. This hotel was spotless, well decorated, warm greeting, helpful front desk personnel and a fantastic breakfast and staff who run it!!!!! Thank You!!! The Carrs

I don't understand how this hotel can be rated number 1. We stayed for one night while visiting LegoLand. The rooms were cramped with uncomfortable beds. Our room smelled of cigarette smoke but there were no other rooms to switch to. The lobby area where breakfast was served was uncomfortably cold and make lingering over breakfast impossible. The adults could not eat the powdery, dry eggs. The kids enjoyed the waffles and there was a good selection of fresh fruit and yogurt. The coffee was brewed so weakly that it was really just brown water.
reviews.title: Unpleasant Hotel Experience

reviews.text: Everything I expect from Hampton Inn. Excellent cleanliness, no safety issues, friendly staff. All at a zero frills price that I don't mind paying. This place was less than 5 minutes away from Legoland, and for something so convenient to a tourist destination, the price was far less than I expected to pay. It's not the Ritz, it's Hampton Inn. It's "excellent" for the value, but it's still a value room.
reviews.title: Great value - clean, safe, and near Legoland

reviews.text: Winter Haven is not exactly a thriving metropolis so there are only so many hotel options. That said, this was our 2nd stay at this hotel, and we were not disappointed. In town to visit Legoland, we arrived after a day at the park. They have tons of seating in the lobby where we ate our take-out dinner. The outdoor pool was a popular spot at the end of the day. Breakfast was fine, it was the standard Hampton Inn fare.
reviews.title: Great for Legoland, very busy location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were well kept and clean, and what sets this hotel apart is the staff. They are truly outgoing and make you feel very special as their guest with the way they speak to you. I remembered one associate made me feel this way on our first visit 15 months earlier, and sure enough, she was there again when we checked in. These are the people that make a hotel experience unique and should be commended.
reviews.title: MIssing Desk Clerk
family getaway
reviews.text: The hotel is located in a very busy location with lots going on. Outback Steakhouse, Red Lobster, Holiday Inn, and this Hampton all share parking... It can be overwhelming. Also, if you don't like staying at hotels with families and kids, this is not for you.
We would definitely stay there again if we return to Winter Haven.
reviews.title: Excellant customert servuice

reviews.text: This is a nice hotel if your are traveling for business or with the family, there is a lot of shopping and food choices very close also very close to Legoland and only 40 minuets to Disney or Sea World.
reviews.title: Nice , Clean, Lots near by

reviews.text: Left item in room. Very unresponsive in providing information on finding it--which they claim to not have done. Got varying stories and no response until we had called more times than we should have had to. Disappointing.
reviews.title: Good Hotel, friendly staff--except for lost/found

reviews.text: Great location for Ironman 70.3 and next to all the eats and nice part of town. We loved eating at Penera right next door. We felt safe with leaving our 4 bikes on the rack at night. Staff was very helpful with taking care of my reservation situation that totally my fault.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: I almost always try to stay at Hampton Inns. This one did not disappoint. It is located 3 miles from Legoland. The staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast was pretty good. Would recommend this hotel to others!
reviews.title: Location, location, location

reviews.text: I spent Thursday and Friday night at the Hampton Inn (Winter Haven) accommodations - good; nearby restaurants and Lego Land. Must be familiar with traveling (Yeehaw Junction) to arrive to enjoy what this town has to offer
reviews.title: Good for business or family fun at Lego Land

reviews.text: We like the location of this hotel as it is very convenient to Legoland & lots of area restaurants. We have stayed @ the Holiday Inn next door which is nicer, but we like the breakfast that is provided free of charge. We are not big breakfast eaters so this is fine for us & the children. Coffee, juice, cereal, milk, toast, waffles, bagels & fruit. The girl who worked the weekend was much more accommodating than the woman during the week. Seating is @ premium as there aren't enough tables & chairs. She went & got folding chairs & a large folding table for some guests. I thought that was very nice of her. The eggs & whatever other hot food items, three in total didn't look appetizing @ all. But what do you want for free. We were on the 2nd floor near the elevator, & it was quiet. Rooms were ok, need updating, but clean. Never left enough towels, our connecting room had 2 adults, 2 kids & a baby & they were never left enough towels, although extra towels were requested on our reservation & the front desk. I personally told the maid & that day I wasn't given hand towels or any extra bath towels. My son's room only got 3 bath towels for 5 people. Never got a chocolate chip cookie the entire stay. They were always gone, had macadamia & oatmeal raisin. They were good but kids always wanted a chocolate chip cookie. Always had coffee available in the lobby. Nice feature. Hotel pool was very small, had to get pool towels in the fitness room & several times there were none. They were those very small white towels with the blue stripe. Pool was clean.
reviews.title: Close to Legoland

reviews.text: Good option close to legoland - you get the Hilton/Hampton Inn experience - free WiFi and hot breakfast. Lobby and facilities are nice/modern. Rooms could use updating (new mattresses and furnishings). We had an ineffective A/C which made for a long warm night in Florida in July. Also, the elevator was broken meaning I had to lug ourselves and our luggage up and down 2 flights of stairs, no small task for a 9 month pregnant woman with a toddler in tow - no assistance was offered to me for help getting my bags upstairs.
reviews.title: Closest Hilton-Brand Hotel to Legoland
Great choice for Lego Land visitors
reviews.text: Front desk attendee was very nice and professional. Cookies made fresh daily was a great touch. Room was clean and in good shape. Shuttle provided to Lego Land. Overall a good experience. The only issue came with breakfast. I know it is complimentary however the hot portion was questionable at best. Eggs were weird consistency (almost like blue cheese crumbles) and the sausage patties were still frozen on the inside. Pretty disappointing but we got by with cereal, toast and some good coffee.

Arrived early and took the complimentary shuttle to Legoland. We came back after a hot day and checked in, soon after we got into our room the front desk called to be sure that everything was all right and that nothing was needed. The next morning we had breakfast which was good and had the kids ready to start their day. Perfect for a family trip!
reviews.title: Legoland Hotel

reviews.text: We had a great trip to Winter Haven and LEGOLAND with my grandson. The Hotel was perfect for our purpose and the location was grand. It was near the train station where we arrived. It had multiple restaurants within walking distance. If we had not had a car transportation was provided to LEGOLAND, a park I would recommend for all 6 to 10 year olds. The Hampton Inn is clean, provides a nice breakfast, had a small pool and the most pleasant and helpful staff I have ever met anywhere.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn Winter Haven, Florida

aka: Hampton Inn Winter Haven Hotel Winter Haven
